author: Kate Cox
title: How to help your kids with their million questions about the coronavirus
description: Some questions are easier to answer than others, but all of them are worthwhile.
content:
Enlarge/ "Why do we have to sing 'Happy Birthday,' Mom?" "We don't, we can sing something else." "OK! Let it go, let it goooooooo..."
2 with 2 posters participating
Basically everyone is some kind of mess right now, as the world seemingly runs away from us … [+6828 chars]
